resources.string: Please choose a source of funds
Unfortunately your application request can not be completed via the app. Please visit your nearest branch for more information.
We require additional information to complete your application. Please contact your Banker or call 0861 000 734 for assistance.
To process your application, please visit your nearest branch with your ID and Proof of Residence (e.g. a water or electricity bill) not older than 3 months.
Your Absa profile needs to be updated\n\nPlease visit a branch to update your profile information to proceed.
Your Absa profile needs to be updated\n\nPlease logon to Absa Online, or visit a branch to update your profile information to proceed.
